name: GroupActivitySharingController
desc: A view controller you use to enable people to start a SharePlay session from your app.

items.name: init<ActivityType>(ActivityType) throws
items.desc: Initializes the SharePlay sharing controller with the group activity.

items.name: init<ActivityType>(preparationHandler: () async throws -> ActivityType)
items.desc: Initializes the SharePlay sharing controller with the group activity and type.

items.name: var result: GroupActivitySharingResult
items.desc: The result of a request to share a group activity.

items.name: func viewDidLoad()
items.desc: Notifies the view controller that the system added a view to a view hierarchy.

items.name: func viewWillAppear(Bool)
items.desc: Notifies the view controller that the system is going to add a view to a view hierarchy.
